TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpRuntimeSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class HttpRuntimeSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET HTTP 运行时。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET HTTP runtime.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许处理那些影响 ASP.NET 运行时行为的参数。The allows you to handle those parameters that affect the behavior of the ASP.NET runtime. 它引用由 `` 元素指示的配置文件中的节点，并且可在配置层次结构中的任何级别使用。It refers to the node in the configuration file that is indicated by the `` element and can be used at any level in the configuration hierarchy. 部分包含管理以下各项的指令：The section contains directives that manage the following: - 请求执行超时。Request execution timeouts. - 用于在应用程序级别进行线程调度的指令。Directives to thread scheduling at the application level. - 控制应用程序队列限制的指令。Directives that govern application queue limits. - 请求长度。Request length. 在单个进程中运行多个应用程序时，应锁定此部分，使应用程序不能将其相对优先级提升到另一个进程。When running more than one application in a single process, you should lock down this section so that applications cannot elevate their relative priority to one another.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 为应用程序排入队列的最大请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of requests that ASP.NET queues for the application.

value.span: 队列中允许的最大请求数。

span.span: The maximum number of requests that can be queued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有足够的可用线程来处理这些请求，ASP.NET 将请求队列。ASP.NET queues requests when there are not enough free threads to process them. > [!NOTE] > 当排队的请求数超过此设置施加的限制时，将拒绝传入的请求并出现 "503-服务器太忙" 错误。When the number of requests queued exceeds the limit imposed by this setting, incoming requests will be rejected with a "503 - Server Too Busy" error. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#16)]

span.span: The mode of the request entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 管道中设置 之前，必须设置此属性。This property must to be set before is set in the ASP.NET pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置 "" 属性，可以解决某些防病毒应用程序将信息写回扫描文件时导致的问题。You can address the problem caused by some antivirus applications, when writing information back to the scanned files, by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 之所以出现此问题，是因为防病毒扫描导致的文件更改无法与用户所进行的更改区分开来。The problem occurs because file changes caused by antivirus scanning cannot be distinguished from the ones made by the user. 最终的结果是重新启动正在扫描其文件的应用程序。The end result is the restart of the application whose files are being scanned. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#11)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application domain is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用该应用程序域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application domain is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设置会影响当前节点级别和下面的应用程序域。This setting affects the application domain or domains at the current node level and below. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableHeaderChecking { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableHeaderChecking : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了标头检查。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header checking is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用该标头检查，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the header checking is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的目的是启用在响应标头中找到的回车符和换行符（`\r` 和 `\n`）的编码。The purpose of this property is to enable encoding of the carriage return and newline characters, `\r` and `\n`, that are found in response headers. 在出站响应标头中，将对由代码0x1F 和更低表示的字符进行编码，还会对字符0x7F （删除字符）进行编码。In outbound response headers, the characters that are represented by the codes 0x1F and below are encoded and also the character 0x7F (delete character). 唯一的例外情况是不修改字符0x09 （制表符）。The only exception is that the character 0x09 (the tab character) is unmodified. 这种编码有助于避免注入攻击，攻击者利用该应用程序回显了标头中包含的不受信任的数据。This encoding can help to avoid injection attacks that exploit an application that echoes untrusted data contained by the header. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不适用于状态行本身（状态代码和状态说明），但也适用于其他标头。This property does not apply to the status line itself (status code and status description), but should apply to other headers. 尽管可以在任何级别设置[<httpRuntime>](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) ，但此属性仅适用于计算机级别和应用程序级别。Although [<httpRuntime>](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) can be set at any level, this property is only applicable at the machine and application level. 如果 `true`此属性（这是默认设置），则会将在响应标头中找到的 `\r` 或 `\n` 字符编码为 `%0d` 和 `%0a`。When this property is `true`, which is the default, the `\r` or `\n` characters found in a response header are encoded to `%0d` and `%0a`. 这会使插入的材料部分成为同一标题行，从而使标头注入式攻击无法实现。This defeats header-injection attacks by making the injected material part of the same header line. 这可能会导致响应中断，但不应针对客户端打开攻击向量。This might break the response but should not open attack vectors against the client. 但在任何情况下，回显不受信任的数据都不是一个好主意。Echoing back untrusted data is never a good idea in any situation, though. > [!IMPORTANT] > HTTP 标头延续依赖于跨越多行的标头，并在其中需要新行。HTTP header continuations rely on headers spanning multiple lines and require new lines in them. 如果需要使用标头延续，则需要将 属性设置为 `false`。If you need to use header continuations, you need to set the property to `false`. 由于查看标头会影响性能，因此，如果您确信已经执行了正确的检查，则关闭此功能可以提高应用程序的性能。Because there is a performance impact from looking at headers, if you are certain you are already doing the right checks, turning off this feature can improve the performance of your application. 在禁用此功能之前，请确保已在此区域获得正确的预防措施。Before you disable this feature, be sure you are already taking the right precautions in this area. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#20)]

span.span: HTTP

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableKernelOutputCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableKernelOutputCache : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了输出缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether output caching is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用输出缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if output caching is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了缓存响应，需要满足以下条件：In order to cache a response, the following criteria need to be met: - 缓存必须由页面指令或缓存 API 显式启用。Caching must be explicitly enabled by a page directive or by the caching API. - 缓存必须具有过期策略，以便内核知道何时丢弃该策略。Caching must have an expiration policy so that the kernel knows when to discard it. - 缓存不能包含任何变量标头或参数。Caching cannot have any variable headers or parameters. - 请求不得要求任何身份验证。The request must not require any authentication. > [!NOTE] > 仅当安装了 Internet Information Services （IIS）版本6.0 或更高版本时，此属性才适用。This property is relevant only when Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 or later is installed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#3)]

span.span: ASP.NET Caching Features
Performance Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio 使用此属性来确定正在使用的 ASP.NET 版本。This attribute is used by Visual Studio to determine which version of ASP.NET is in use. 它不是生产站点所必需的，并且可以禁用。It is not necessary for production sites and can be disabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#17)]

span.span: Assembly versioning

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncoderType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EncoderType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于处理 HTML 和 URL 编码的自定义类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a custom type that can be used to handle HTML and URL encoding.

value.span: 可用于处理 HTML 和 URL 编码的类型的名称。

span.span: The name of a type that can be used to handle HTML and URL encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用 类型作为 HTML 和 URL 编码任务的默认处理程序。ASP.NET uses the type as the default handler for HTML and URL encoding tasks. 若要自定义编码行为，你可以创建从 类型继承的类。To customize encoding behavior, you can create a class that inherits from the type. 在应用程序的配置文件中，将 `httpRuntime` 元素的 特性设置为自定义类型的完全限定字符串名称。In the configuration file for an application, you then set the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element to the fully qualified string name of the custom type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ExecutionTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ExecutionTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的允许执行时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the allowed execution time for the request.

value.span: 一个 值，指示请求的允许执行时间。

span.span: A value that indicates the allowed execution time for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示 ASP.NET 自动关闭前允许执行请求的最大秒数。The property indicates the maximum number of seconds a request is allowed to execute before being automatically shut down by ASP.NET. 默认值为110秒。The default is 110 seconds. 仅当 `` 元素中的 debug 特性设置为 `false`时，此超时才适用。This time-out applies only if the debug attribute in the `` element is set to `false`. 如果超时过期，则会引发异常。If the time-out expires an exception is raised. 您可以在事件日志的应用程序文件夹中记录相关信息。You can record the related information in the Application folder of the Event Log. 为此，请在 `` 配置元素中启用应用程序运行状况监视。You do this by enabling the application health monitoring in the `` configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#10)]

exception.span: 请求执行时间超过了执行超时值设置的限制值。

span.span: The request execution time exceeded the limit set by the execution time-out.

member this.FcnMode : System.Web.Configuration.FcnMode with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value specifying the file change notifications mode.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxQueryStringLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxQueryStringLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求中查询字符串的最大可能长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible length, in number of characters, of a query string in an HTTP request.

value.span: 查询字符串的最大长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: The maximum length of the query string, in number of characters.

value.span: 默认值为 2048。

span.span: The default is 2048.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值可以是零或更大的任何整数。The value of the property can be any integer, zero or greater. 如果查询字符串的长度超过大小限制，则 ASP.NET 将返回 `HTTP 400` （错误请求）状态代码。If the length of a query string exceeds the size limit, ASP.NET returns an `HTTP 400` (Bad Request) status code. > [!NOTE] > 极小的值可能会使网站无法使用。Extremely small values can make a Web site unusable. 通过设置 `httpRuntime` 元素的 `maxQueryStringLength` 特性，可以在配置文件中设置此值。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the `maxQueryStringLength` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 还有一个控制查询字符串长度的 IIS 设置。There is also an IIS setting that controls query string length. 请参阅[\ 请求限制](http://www.iis.net/ConfigReference/system.webServer/security/requestFiltering/requestLimits)中的 `maxQueryString` 属性。See the `maxQueryString` attribute in [Request Limits \](http://www.iis.net/ConfigReference/system.webServer/security/requestFiltering/requestLimits).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRequestLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxRequestLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum request size.

value.span: 请求的最大大小（以千字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum request size in kilobytes.

value.span: 默认大小为 4096 KB (4 MB)。

span.span: The default size is 4096 KB (4 MB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定输入流的缓冲阈值的限制。The property specifies the limit for the buffering threshold of the input stream. 例如，此限制可用于防止拒绝服务攻击，这些攻击由向服务器发送大型文件的用户造成。For example, this limit can be used to prevent denial of service attacks that are caused by users who post large files to the server. 分配给此属性的值应大于或等于赋给 属性的值。The value assigned to this property should be greater or equal to value assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前 属性值。The following example shows how to obtain the current property value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#19)]

span.span: The selected value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxUrlLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxUrlLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求中 URL 的最大可能长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible length, in number of characters, of the URL in an HTTP request.

value.span: URL 的长度，以字符数表示。

span.span: The length of the URL, in number of characters.

value.span: 默认值为 260。

span.span: The default is 260.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值可以是零或更大的任何整数。The value of the property can be any integer, zero or greater. > [!NOTE] > 极小的值可能会使网站无法使用。Extremely small values can make a Web site unusable. 如果请求 URL 的长度（即 属性的值）超过配置的大小限制，则 ASP.NET 将返回 HTTP 400 （错误请求）状态代码If the length of the request URL (which is the value of the property) exceeds the configured size limit, ASP.NET returns an HTTP 400 (Bad Request) status code 通过设置 `httpRuntime` 元素的 特性，可以在配置文件中设置此值。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWaitChangeNotification { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxWaitChangeNotification : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置从第一次更改通知到应用程序域重新启动之间的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval between the first change notification and the time at which the application domain is restarted.

value.span: 从第一次更改通知到应用程序域重新启动之间的最大时间间隔（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The maximum time interval, in seconds, from the first change notification and the time when the application domain is restarted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的建议值将超过部署过程中完成复制的时间长度。A suggested value for the property would exceed the length of time to complete a copy during the deployment process. > [!NOTE] > 如果在复制和部署过程后立即查看内容，内容可能会被缓存。The content might appear cached if you view it immediately after a copy-and-deploy process. 这是典型行为。This is typical behavior. 所做的更改会在你指定的等待时间已过。The changes take effect when the wait period that you specified has elapsed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#4)]

span.span: Application Domains Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinFreeThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinFreeThreads : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在能够为此配置范围中的资源请求提供服务之前必须存在的最小自由线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of threads that must be free before a request for resources in this configuration scope can be serviced.

value.span: 在此配置范围中的请求得到服务之前，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 线程池中的最小自由线程数。

span.span: The minimum number of free threads in the common language runtime (CLR) thread pool before a request in this configuration scope will be serviced.

value.span: 默认值为8。

span.span: The default value is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义用于执行请求的最小自由线程数。The property defines the minimum number of free threads to execute a request. 如果线程数不足，请求将保持排队状态，并且对线程可用性进行定期检查将继续，直到存在所需的线程量。If a sufficient number of threads are not available, the request will remain queued and periodic checks for thread availability will continue until the required amount of threads are present. 默认值是 `8`。The default value is `8`. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 为需要额外线程完成其处理的请求保留了多个自由线程。ASP.NET keeps this many threads free for requests that require additional threads to complete their processing. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#8)]

span.span: Threads and Threading
Using Threads and Threading

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinLocalRequestFreeThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinLocalRequestFreeThreads : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为本地请求提供服务所需要的最小自由线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of free threads required to service a local request.

value.span: 分配给本地请求的最小自由线程数。

span.span: The minimum number of free threads assigned to local requests.

value.span: 默认值为 4。

span.span: The default value is 4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义 ASP.NET 为允许执行新的本地请求而保留的可用线程数。The property defines the number of free threads that ASP.NET keeps available to allow execution of new local requests. 目的是避免在将递归重入到 Web 服务器时出现可能的死锁。The intent is to avoid a possible deadlock with recursive reentry into the Web server. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#5)]

Using Threads and Threading

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 HTTP 请求中的 URL 是否必须为有效的 Windows 文件路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the URL in an HTTP request is required to be a valid Windows file path.

value.span: 如果该 URL 不必符合 Windows 路径规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the URL does not have to comply with Windows path rules; otherwise .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定传入 HTTP 请求中的 URL 的验证方式。The property determines how the URL in an incoming HTTP request will be validated. 如果 `false`此属性，则使用与确定 Windows 文件系统路径是否有效的相同规则来验证 URL。If this property is `false`, the URL is validated by using the same rules that determine whether a Windows file system path is valid. 通过设置 `httpRuntime` 元素的 特性，可以在配置文件中设置此值。You can set this value in a configuration file by setting the attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)).

member this.RequestLengthDiskThreshold : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置输入流缓冲阈值。

span.span: Gets or sets the input-stream buffering threshold.

value.span: 指示输入流缓冲阈值的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes that indicate the input-stream buffering threshold.

value.span: 默认值为 80 千字节。

span.span: The default is 80 kilobytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定输入流缓冲阈值限制（以字节数为单位）。The property specifies the input-stream buffering threshold limit in number of bytes. 它的值不应超过 属性值。Its value should not exceed the property value. 请求实体超过此阈值后，它将以透明方式缓冲到磁盘上。After a request entity exceeds this threshold, it is buffered transparently onto disk. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#12)]

span.span: The selected value is greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestPathInvalidCharacters { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.RequestPathInvalidCharacters : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符列表，这些字符在 HTTP 请求包含的路径中指定为无效字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of characters that are specified as invalid in a path that is part of an HTTP request.

value.span: 一个以逗号分隔的无效字符列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of invalid characters.

value.span: 以下列表包含默认的无效字符集：

span.span: The following list contains the default set of invalid characters:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在配置文件中设置此值，可以将逗号分隔的字符串分配给 `httpRuntime` 元素的 `requestPathInvalidCharacters` 属性。To set this value in a configuration file, you can assign a comma-separated string of characters to the `requestPathInvalidCharacters` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ RequestValidationMode { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };
member this.RequestValidationMode : Version with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个版本号，该版本号指示将使用哪种 ASP.NET 版本特定的验证方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a version number that indicates which ASP.NET version-specific approach to validation will be used.

value.span: 一个值，指示将使用哪种 ASP.NET 版本特定的验证方法。

span.span: A value that indicates which ASP.NET version-specific approach to validation will be used.

value.span: 默认值为4.5。

span.span: The default is 4.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定将使用哪种 ASP.NET 方法进行验证。The property specifies which ASP.NET approach to validation will be used. 这可以是在版本4之前的 ASP.NET 中使用的算法，也可以是 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中使用的版本。This can be the algorithm that is used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than version 4, or the version that is used in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. 属性可以设置为以下值：The property can be set to the following values: - 在此模式下 `4.5 (the default).`，将会延迟加载值，也就是说，在请求这些值之前，将不会读取这些值。`4.5 (the default).` In this mode, values are lazily loaded, that is, they are not read until they are requested. - `4.0` 对象在内部设置一个标志，该标志指示只要访问任何 HTTP 请求数据，就应触发请求验证。`4.0` The object internally sets a flag that indicates that request validation should be triggered whenever any HTTP request data is accessed. 这可以保证在请求过程中访问 cookie 和 Url 等数据之前触发请求验证。This guarantees that the request validation is triggered before data such as cookies and URLs are accessed during the request. 配置文件中的 `` 元素（如果有）或单个页中[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的请求验证设置将被忽略。The request validation settings of the `` element (if any) in the configuration file or of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive in an individual page are ignored. - `2.0` 列中的一个值匹配。`2.0`. 仅对页面（而不是对所有 HTTP 请求）启用请求验证。Request validation is enabled only for pages, not for all HTTP requests. 此外，配置文件中的 `` 元素（如果有）或单个页中[@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100))指令的请求验证设置用于确定要验证的页面请求。In addition, the request validation settings of the `` element (if any) in the configuration file or of the [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive in an individual page are used to determine which page requests to validate. - `0.0` 列中的一个值匹配。`0.0`. 已为应用程序禁用请求验证。Request validation is disabled for the application. 只能在 ASP.NET 4.6 和更高版本中识别 `0.0`。`0.0` is only recognized in ASP.NET 4.6 and later. 你分配给此属性的值未经过验证，无法匹配 ASP.NET 的特定版本。The value that you assign to this property is not validated to match a specific version of ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 4.5 中，和更早的数值小于 `4.0` （例如，`3.7`、`2.9`或 `2.0`）被解释为 `2.0`。In ASP.NET 4.5, and earlier any numeric value less than `4.0` (for example, `3.7`, `2.9`, or `2.0`) is interpreted as `2.0`. 任何大于 `4.5` 的数字将被解释为 `4.5`。Any number greater than `4.5` is interpreted as `4.5`. 在 ASP.NET 4.6 和更高版本中，`0.0` 大于 `4.0` （例如 `3.7`、`2.9`或 `1.0`）的任何数值将被解释为 `2.0`。In ASP.NET 4.6, and later any numeric value greater than `0.0` and less than `4.0` (for example, `3.7`, `2.9`, or `1.0`) is interpreted as `2.0`. 任何大于 `4.5` 的数字将被解释为 `4.5`Any number greater than `4.5` is interpreted as `4.5` 若要在配置文件中设置此值，可以向 `httpRuntime` 元素的 `requestValidationMode` 属性分配一个值。To set this value in a configuration file, you can assign a value to the `requestValidationMode` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestValidationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.RequestValidationType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证 HTTP 请求的类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a type that is used to validate HTTP requests.

value.span: 处理请求验证任务的类型的名称。

span.span: The name of a type that handles request validation tasks.

value.span: 默认值为 ASP.NET 用于验证的 类型的完全限定名称。

span.span: The default is the fully qualified name of the type that ASP.NET uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要自定义 ASP.NET 请求验证行为，你可以创建从 类型继承的类。To customize ASP.NET request validation behavior, you can create a class that inherits from the type. 在应用程序的配置文件中，将 `httpRuntime` 元素的 `requestValidationType` 特性设置为自定义类型的完全限定字符串名称。In the configuration file for an application, you then set the `requestValidationType` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element to the fully qualified string name of the custom type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)).

value.span: 如果文件名必须为完全限定的物理文件路径，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the file name must be a fully qualified physical file path; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 `SaveAs` 方法的文件名参数是否必须是根路径。The property specifies whether the file name argument to `SaveAs` methods must be a rooted path. ASP.NET 进程必须有权在指定位置创建文件。The ASP.NET process must have permission to create files in the specified location. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类中定义的保存方法。For more information, see the save methods defined in the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SendCacheControlHeader { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SendCacheControlHeader : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 cache-control:private 标头是否作为 HTTP 响应的一部分来发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cache-control:private header is sent as part of the HTTP response.

value.span: 如果要发送缓存控制：专用标头，则为; 否则为。否则，。

span.span: if the cache-control:private header is to be sent; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检查 属性和 属性，以确定是否要在 HTTP 响应中发送 `cache-control:private` 标头。The class checks both the property and the property to determine whether to send the `cache-control:private` header in the HTTP response. 如果将任一属性设置为 `false`，则不会发送标头。If either property is set to `false`, the header will not be sent. 当缓存控制标头设置为 "`private`" 时，客户端将不会在共享缓存中缓存响应。When the cache-control header is set to `private`, then the client will not cache the response in a shared cache. 提供对 类中 属性的支持，以便与旧版应用程序兼容;此属性在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。Support for the property in the class is provided for compatibility with legacy applications; this property is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class.

span.span: A value that indicates the length of time the application is allowed to idle before it is terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示应用程序正常关闭之前的时间量。The property indicates the amount of time before an application is shut down gracefully. 默认值为90秒。The default is 90 seconds. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示客户端重定向是完全限定（以 `http://server/path`形式）还是发送到客户端。The property indicates whether client-side redirects are fully qualified (in the form `http://server/path`) or whether relative redirects are instead sent to the client. > [!NOTE] > 如果此值为 `false`，某些浏览器在无 cookie 会话中加载页面时可能会出现问题。Some browsers might have problems loading pages in cookieless sessions when this value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#15)]

span.span: The waiting time, in seconds, before the next change notification that triggers an application domain to restart.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的建议值将超过部署过程中完成复制的时间长度。A suggested value for would exceed the length of time to complete a copy during the deployment process. > [!NOTE] > 如果在复制和部署过程后立即查看内容，内容可能会被缓存。The content might appear cached if you view it immediately after a copy and deploy process. 这是典型行为。This is typical behavior. 所做的更改会在你指定的等待时间已过。The changes take effect when the wait period that you specified has elapsed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/CS/httpruntimesection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection/VB/httpruntimesection.vb#18)]

span.span: Application Domains Overview
